title: Smashbox Camera Ready BB Cream SPF 35 Light/Medium
description: Your go-to for flawless skin. Just let it BB.So what does BB do?PRIMES: Wear alone, or under your favorite foundation to create a smooth canvas.PERFECTS: Tinted formula in 5 shades evens out skin for a flawless finish.HYDRATES: Improves skin moisture in 4 weeks. Guaranteed.PROTECTS: SPF 35 guards against UVA/UVB rays.Tips:BB TIP 1: BB any way you want. Use it as a primer. Use it for light coverage. Use it however you see fit!BB TIP 2: Don't use too much! Just a pea size will do. (Hint: if you need more coverage, see tip #3. No need for lots of layers.)BB TIP 3: Looks great alone for quick, camera-ready skin. Or pair BB with your favorite foundation for more coverage. We adore it with Halo Hydrating Perfecting Powder.BB TIP 4: Have dry skin? Still moisturize first. Have oily/combination skin? BB is all you'll need.BB TIP 5: Regular use will improve your skin! BB is loaded with anti-aging peptides for a decrease in fine lines over time, plus it
